Package edu.bu.met.cs665.bev.hardware

Interface HardwareInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MockHardwareInterface
    public interface HardwareInterface
    An interface into the brewing hardware.
    Author:
    Christopher D. Canfield

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<CompletedOrder> makeRecipe​(Recipe recipe)
      Passes the specified recipe to the hardware, which then creates it.
      int ordersPending()
      Returns the number of orders that are waiting to be completed.
      boolean waitForCompletion​(int timeoutMilliseconds)
      Shuts down the hardware interface, and waits for any already submitted orders to be processed, as long they can be completed before the timeoutMilliseconds expires.

    • Method Detail

      • makeRecipe

        com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<CompletedOrder> makeRecipe​(Recipe recipe)
        Passes the specified recipe to the hardware, which then creates it.
        Parameters:
        recipe - the recipe to make.
        Returns:
        a future that will contain the completed order, once the drink has been made.

      • ordersPending

        int ordersPending()
        Returns the number of orders that are waiting to be completed.
        Returns:
        the number of orders that are waiting to be completed.

      • waitForCompletion

        boolean waitForCompletion​(int timeoutMilliseconds)
                   throws InterruptedException
        Shuts down the hardware interface, and waits for any already submitted orders to be processed, as long they can be completed before the timeoutMilliseconds expires.
        Parameters:
        timeoutMilliseconds - the maximum amount of time, in milliseconds, to wait for the orders to finish.
        Returns:
        true if all orders were processed, or false otherwise.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - the thread was interrupted.
